* direction flag is set acc. to the direction that is to be followed.

if the direction is up - flag will always be 0
if direction is down - flag will always be 1
if direction is up-down - flag will switch after each cycle starting with flag = 1
if direction is down-up -flag will switch after each cycle starting with flag = 0
